name: Bank of Valletta Group
membership: Corporate Members of trade association and networks, such as the European Savings Banks Group (ESBG), the European Long-Term Investors (ELTI) Association and the European Banking Federation (EBF) via the Malta Bankers Association (MBA).
goal: Bank of Valletta Group is a leading Malta based financial servcies group providing a wide range of banking and financial services to personal and corporate clients.  Our business activities include the entire range of retail banking services as well as the sale of financial products, such as units in collective investment schemes.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Bank of Valletta being a specialist in the implementation of EU funded guarantee financial instruments follows EU initiatives related to SME finance, the Multiannual Financial Framework and European Structural and investment funds.  The Representative Office also follows Banking Union files related specifically to CRR and BRRD.
